name: @logo-software/toast
description: This module generates a table using the given data. The table can generate data using server-side Http requests or given direct data using the client-side feature.

scripts.gitold: git add . && git commit -m '$TYPE('$npm_package_name'): upgrading to v.'$npm_package_version
scripts.patch:commit: npm run ver:patch && npm run build && TYPE=fix npm run git-commit
scripts.minor:commit: npm run ver:minor && npm run build && TYPE=feat npm run git-commit
scripts.prerelease:commit: npm run ver:prerelease && npm run build && TYPE=prerelease npm run git-commit
scripts.release:commit: npm run ver:major && TYPE=release npm run git-release
